channel.title: Apk on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Apk on TLDRBins

item.title: Android
item.description: Unpack .apk file # Get .smali files java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar d app.apk # Get .java files jadx app.apk Ref: apktool Ref: jadx Re-pack .apk file 1. Initial pack java -jar apktool_2.9.3.jar b --use-aapt2 app -o app_repacked.apk 2. zip align zipalign 3. Sign the apk keytool -genkey -v -keystore my-release-key.jks -keyalg RSA -keysize 2048 -validity 10000 -alias my-alias apksigner sign --ks my-release-key.jks --ks-pass pass:<PASSWORD> --out app_final.apk app_repacked.apk Dynamic Debugging 1. Set up +--------------------------------------------------------------------+ | 1.
